feature.label: iSphere for WDSCi 7.0 (recommended)
feature.description: iSphere for WDSCi 7.0 The "iSphere RSE Feature (WDSCi)" delivers services that are specific to WDSCi. It completely relies on and extends the iSphere Core Feature regarding to WDSCi.
